#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long

using namespace std;

const ll MOD = 1000000007;
const ll INF = 1 << 30;
const int MAX = 200005;
ll dp[MAX], a[MAX];

int main()
{
    //freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    int n;
    ll x;
    cin >> n;
    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
    {
        cin >> a[i];
        dp[i] = INF;
    }
    dp[0] = 0;
    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
    {
        for(int j = 1;j+i < n;j <<= 1)
        {
            if(a[i] < a[j+i]) x = a[j+i] - a[i];
            else x = a[i] - a[j+i];
            dp[j+i] = min(dp[j+i], dp[i] + x);
        }
        //cout << dp[i] << ' ';
    }
    cout << dp[n-1] << endl;
    return 0;
}
